AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Court: The court where Federico Saldana's hearing was held, using both 24-hour and 12-hour clock notations for citations and event descriptions, and where a motion to suppress was denied on February 12, 2015
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Williamson County: location of the Sheriff's Office where detectives Gary Haston and Heather Vargas were based
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.IH-35: highway where detectives Gary Haston and Heather Vargas were traveling northbound on November 24, 2014
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Laredo: location where the trailer's license plate was registered to Daniel Martin Huerta
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.San Antonio: location where the truck's license plate was registered to Daniel A. Huerta
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Laredo checkpoint: checkpoint where Federico Saldana was found transporting drugs
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Dallas: ultimate destination of Federico Saldana's trip for repairs
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.federal prison: place where Federico Saldana served at least 9 years
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.tire shop: location where Jason Cox and Gary Haston discovered cocaine in the truck and trailer, checked the depth of batteries to the scissor lift, and further searched the vehicle
